src:
大山７連発　３日連続の早出特守＆居残り特打　推定１４０メートル特大弾も

03 Nov 2019

　「阪神秋季キャンプ」（２日、安芸）
　阪神の大山悠輔内野手（２５）が、３日連続で志願の早出特守に、居残り特打と、９時間を超える猛練習だ。来季の４番奪回、失策減少に挑む秋。打撃練習では推定１４０メートルの場外弾を含む７連発など、段違いの飛距離を見せつけた。キャンプ３日目。強い覚悟で２０２０年に備える。
　初の休日。満員のスタンドから拍手が鳴りやまない。１本、２本…続けて左翼ネットを揺らす白球。４本目は通称「ディアーネット」を越える推定１４０メートルの特大弾。７連続で締めた。さらに、その後ティー打撃では、井上打撃コーチを相手に、約１２０球の連続スイング。同コーチが言う。
　「キャリアや体力面は、来ているメンバーでは上位だから。低いレベルではダメだということでやりました」
　ただ一人、３日連続で早朝から白球を追い、日が落ちるまで無心で白球を打った。打率・２５８、１４本塁打、７６打点で終えた３年目。両リーグワーストの２０失策も含め、走攻守、全てレベルアップを誓う。目指すは「４番・三塁」として絶対的な存在。妥協はない。
text:
Oyama 7 rounds, 3 days in a row with special early warnings and surviving special hits

03 Nov 2019

"Hanshin Autumn Camp" (Aki, 2nd)
Hanshin's Keisuke Oyama infielder (25) is an early special guardian of volunteers for three consecutive days. Fall 4 next season, fall to try to reduce the number of mistakes. In the hitting practice, he showed a different flight distance, including seven rounds including an external bullet of an estimated 140 meters. The third day of camping. Prepare for 2020 with strong preparedness.
First holiday. Applause does not stop from a full stand. One, two ... A white ball that continuously shakes the left wing net. The fourth is an extraordinary bullet of 140 meters that exceeds the popular name “Dearnet”. Fastened for 7 consecutive times. Furthermore, in the tee hit after that, about 120 consecutive balls swing against Inoue hitting coach. The coach says.
“Because the career and physical strength are high in the coming members, I did it because it is not good in the low level.”
Only one person chased the white ball from early morning for three consecutive days and hit the white ball indefinitely until the sun fell. Batter rate: 258, 14 home runs, third year, finished with 76 points. I swear that I ’m going to run and defend, including the 20 mistakes of both league worsts. The aim is to be an absolute presence as “No. 4 / Sankei”. There is no compromise.
